Welcome to Thefleececompany, where comfort and craftsmanship come together to create the softest, most luxurious fleece blankets you’ll ever own. Founded by Sophie Keller, a girl with a lifelong passion for fleece, our journey began with one simple desire: to make blankets that bring warmth and happiness to every moment.

Sophie’s love for fleece started at a young age, sparked by the comforting embrace of her grandmother’s handmade fleece blankets. These cozy blankets became a symbol of love, warmth, and togetherness for Sophie—a feeling she wanted to share with the world.

With this passion in mind, Sophie spent years searching for the finest fleece materials, learning the art of textile making, and perfecting her craft. After much dedication and hard work, she launched Thefleececompany to deliver the perfect combination of softness and quality.

At The Fleece Company, we believe a blanket isn’t just a way to stay warm—it’s a way to create cherished moments. Whether it’s curling up with a good book, enjoying movie night, or simply relaxing after a long day, our fleece blankets are designed to make every experience more comforting and special.

When you choose one of our blankets, you’re not just buying a product—you’re embracing Sophie’s passion for comfort and quality. Every blanket is crafted with care, love, and a commitment to providing you with warmth and coziness. Snuggle up with us, and let our fleece blankets bring a little more joy into your life!
